subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Johnny Dawkins, a longtime assistant at Duke, has been hired as the men’s coach at Stanford. Dawkins replaces Trent Johnson, who left for Louisiana State earlier this month. Dawkins, who has no head coaching experience, will be introduced at a news conference Monday, the university said.
